name: Bow and Sword
description:
Game for Brackeys Game Jam. Inspired by "Binary Land". Made with GODOT.

Turned into a sword and a bow by a wizard. Two siblings get the strength to put the break the curse and escape the tower.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.AD are mirrored for the right character LEFT/RIGHT for the left.

Q/E changes characters when they are close to one another giving the selected character a weapon.

F attacks when weapon is equipped.

GOAL:

Collect all the gems on the level to open the exit.

Get to the exit.
